summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5421 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 24, D. T. Denny's Home Addition, being the alley between Queen Anne Avenue and 1st Avenue North, from Republician Street to Mercer Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 67722, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
